## FontCatalog.load() method

Loads a `FontCatalog`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string |  |
|  maxCodePointCount | number | Maximum number of unique code points bitmaps this <code>FontCatalog</code>'s internal texture can store simultaneously. |
